SummaryEnglish: Mon Colle Knights features Mondo, a guy wearing a goofy costume. Together with his friend Rockna and her scientist dad, Professor Hiragi, they jump into the Utopian Eagle and zoom off to an outrageous monster-filled place called Mon World. And while they're there, Mondo & Rockna merge with monsters, deal with tin chickens, and fight the evil Prince Eccentro! Their mission: collect all six Monster Items that will bring together their world and Mon World into universal peace. Eccentro's plan: zap monsters and make them evil, steal the six Monster Items, and rule over BOTH worlds. Additional Info Â¢This show was created by Studio Deen, with the English adaptation done by Saban Entertainment.

1.TitleEnglish: Mon Colle Knights Movie: Legend of the Fire Dragon
1.SummaryEnglish: An alternative interpretation of the series' start.

1.TitleEnglish: Fly to the World of Six Gates!
1.SummaryEnglish: 5th graders Mondo Ohya and Rokuna Hiiragi, along with her genius scientist father, Ichiroubei, journey to Six Gates, a world full of monsters and powerful items.

2.SummaryEnglish: Mondo and Rokuna help a girl search for a lost monster in water element territory.

3.SummaryEnglish: A battle of the behemoths takes place in a forest, with the Mon Colle Knights and Count Collection controlling giant monsters.

4.SummaryEnglish: To save the Mermen Tabernacle Choir, Rokuna has to possess a giant frog monster... but she hates frogs.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Knights come upon a land of feuding cactus people, with two young lovers caught in the middle.

6.SummaryEnglish: Mondo on a baby Pegasus vies against Collection riding a Hippogriff in a thrilling air race.

7.SummaryEnglish: After gaining major stress weight, Collection fits right in as the self-proclaimed king of the Orcs.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Knights meet Beginner-chan, a girl who has the skill to summon monsters at will.

9.SummaryEnglish: When the Knights are between a Roc and a hard place, only Jahnay can save the day.

10.SummaryEnglish: When Mondo and Collection are washed up on a desert island together, they become friends?!

11.TitleEnglish: Dig It Up, Get Lost and Drop It!
11.SummaryEnglish: The Knights search for a Mon Mon Item in ancient ruins, only to find plenty of deathtraps and hole-digging Kobolds.

12.TitleEnglish: Show Me Your Smile Once More!
12.SummaryEnglish: Much to Rokuna's fury, Mondo seems to fall for the Diva of the Garden, an elf princess who's bugged by a certain problem.

13.SummaryEnglish: Lonely 5th grade teacher Namiko Gokumare hitches a ride to Six Gates and even helps the Knights in an adventure.

14.TitleEnglish: Does the King Like It Hot?
14.SummaryEnglish: Mondo and Rokuna encounter a talkative penguin at a hot spring, as you do, but party poopers Collection and company aren't far behind.

15.TitleEnglish: Howling at the Night Sky, Dragons!
15.SummaryEnglish: The Knights deal with a Frost Dragon causing unseasonable blizzards.

16.TitleEnglish: Is There Something in the Arisona Desert?!
16.SummaryEnglish: The Mon Colle Knights finally find a Mon Mon Item, but its Earth Dragon owner doesn't want to give it up.

17.SummaryEnglish: It is the Knights versus Collection in an all-out monster battle over the second Mon Mon Item.

18.SummaryEnglish: Count Collection and company are kidnapped by Goblins and forced to become maids.

19.SummaryEnglish: Mondo gets jealous when Rokuna "adopts" Kenta, a young centaur, as a little brother.

20.TitleEnglish: Black Wings Flutter in the Dark!
20.SummaryEnglish: Mondo is stalked by a demonic fallen angel.

21.SummaryEnglish: It is a happy reunion with Pegasus on Cloud Island, interrupted by a powerful giant monster.

22.TitleEnglish: How About Some Terrible Luck, a Great Misfortune, or Unhappiness?
22.SummaryEnglish: Both the Knights and Collection are plagued by a malicious, ill luck-bringing Gremlin.

23.SummaryEnglish: A misunderstanding involving a ring leads to a werecat thinking Rokuna has proposed to him, and transforming into a giant cat. Count Collection and company also want the ring, and a battle ensues. It is up to the Sparrow Squad to get the ring back.

24.TitleEnglish: Is Food Cooked With Love a Little Extreme?!
24.SummaryEnglish: It is the Knights versus Count Collection and company again, but this time in a cooking battle!

25.SummaryEnglish: Collection uses the Mirror of Lies to change the forms of Ichiroubei and the Knights.

26.TitleEnglish: Rainbow Emerging From a Break in the Darkness
26.SummaryEnglish: Sacher, the fallen angel, tries to prove that the Mon Colle Knights would betray their comrades.

27.SummaryEnglish: Count Collection and company finally get a cute mascot of their own, a Leprechaun who likes to blow up their ship.

28.SummaryEnglish: Mondo enters the grueling Gillmen Triathlon.

29.SummaryEnglish: Mondo and Rokuna go to Six Gates Academy to learn how to be monster-summoning evocaters.

30.SummaryEnglish: Collection tricks the lovelorn Luke into attacking Mondo.

31.TitleEnglish: Mermaid Princess of the Sea Castle!
31.SummaryEnglish: The Knights enjoy their time at the Pearl Mermaid Princess's castle until Collection causes a seaquake.

32.SummaryEnglish: Collection and company secretly help the Mon Colle Knights find a Mon Mon Item so they can steal it from them.

33.SummaryEnglish: Mondo and Rokuna are trapped inside a haunted house, hunted by the vampiric creature Collection has become.

34.SummaryEnglish: A giant, ravenous Jahnay goes on the rampage in a forest village.

35.SummaryEnglish: Somehow Collection becomes a macho man and enters the Mightiest Man Contest, a free-for-all brawl.

36.SummaryEnglish: With a Mon Mon Item at stake, the Knights play baseball against Collection, who has a giant on his team.

37.SummaryEnglish: The Valkyrie Girl Recruits return and despite their clumsiness, the Knights try to help them become full-fledged members.

38.TitleEnglish: The Wind and Rokuna's Fairy Tale
38.SummaryEnglish: Rokuna's dream comes true when she gets to meet fairies in Six Gates, but Collection spoils things by unleashing Bahamut, an ornery wind dragon.

39.TitleEnglish: The Great Battle Beyond the Wave!
39.SummaryEnglish: Tiamat sponsors a water-based monster battle, with a Mon Mon Item in the balance, but something lurks behind the scenes...

40.SummaryEnglish: Rokuna must continue the fight, even when it seems Mondo is gone for good.

41.SummaryEnglish: While on a journey as part of their magical training, Luke tries to find an item that will give him the courage to tell Beginner how he feels about her.

42.SummaryEnglish: It is Ichiroubei versus Collection, one on one, as they search for a Mon Mon Item in a land of scorching heat.

43.SummaryEnglish: The Mon Colle Knights help the neat freak fairy, Kikimora, when Collection steals her magic broom.

44.SummaryEnglish: Some Kobold scientists retrieve Collection's abandoned Tan-Tan-Tanuki Detector and bring it to life.

45.SummaryEnglish: Gokumare meets the man of her dreams in a "magical forest," but gets more than she bargains for.

46.SummaryEnglish: Mondo and Rokuna want to make friends with Fire Dragon, but it only seems interested in burning them to a crisp.

47.TitleEnglish: The Birth of the Ultimate Flaming Dragon!
47.SummaryEnglish: The Mon Colle Knights are in the fight of their lives against the demonic magic of Reda, the Angel of Red Death.

48.TitleEnglish: Showdown! The Angel of Red Death's Trap
48.SummaryEnglish: Reda abducts Rokuna and takes her to the demonic domain.

49.TitleEnglish: The Gathering of the Six Mon Mon Items!
49.SummaryEnglish: Mondo and his allies journey to the Charon Zone to rescue Rokuna, but they fall one by one before the might of the Terror Dragon.

50.TitleEnglish: The Vanishing World of Six Gates
50.SummaryEnglish: The world of Six Gates is about to be wiped out as the Master of Time returns.

51.SummaryEnglish: It is the final showdown between the Mon Colle Knights and the extra-dimensional Ouroboros.
